snippet: Three episodes in the drama have proved popular, helped further by delayed viewing. “Lucky 7” on ABC was the first new show to be sidelined.
abstract: Fox television series Sleepy Hollow is first network show to be renewed for second season; ABC's drama Lucky 7 is first TV program to be cancelled.
lead_paragraph: Three episodes in the drama have proved popular, helped further by delayed viewing. “Lucky 7” on ABC was the first new show to be sidelined.

headline.main: ‘Sleepy Hollow’ on Fox Is First New Show to Be Renewed
